items.sentence: I want you to return the book I lent you the other day.
I wanted to give Tom an extra day to finish the report.
I was hoping I could go back to the beach next weekend.
Tom folded the paper in half before handing it to Mary.
On Christmas Day, Tom\'s right leg was still in a cast.
I can\'t see myself lying in bed until eleven o\'clock.
Kissing a person who smokes is like licking an ashtray.
Many things kept me from getting much sleep last night.
Mary goes to that restaurant for lunch every other day.
Most shops near the school are closed on Saturdays now.
